sentences.en: And the negative exemplar shows stronger effect on the positive target than on the negative one.
sentences.cn: 而反面样例对高效价靶子的效应更强.

sentences.en: He is an exemplar of success.
Milt's career is an exemplar of survival in difficult times.
sentences.cn: 米尔特的生涯可谓逆境生存的典范.

sentences.en: Public galleries section where people can view exemplar portfolio work.
sentences.cn: 公共画廊部分,在那里人们可以看到的典范作品集.

sentences.en: The exemplar nurse is efficient while patient, strict while loving and is quite welcome in children.
sentences.cn: 模范护士玛丽工作讲效率又有耐心, 严格却富有爱心,深受小孩的喜爱.

sentences.en: They viewed their new building as an exemplar of taste.
sentences.cn: 他们认为他们的新大厦品位独特，可作为典范。

sentences.en: Throughout the book there are clear explanations, and exemplar sentences where they are needed.
sentences.cn: 在书中有清楚的解释和他们是需要的模范句子.

sentences.en: Under Mr Blair, fusty old Britain has become an international exemplar of openness.
sentences.cn: 在布莱尔的领导下, 曾经老迈保守的大不列颠摇身一变成了国际间开放的榜样.

words.tran_cn: 典范的；惩戒性的；可仿效的

trans.tran_cn: 模型， 模范，原型， 典型
